T02D2024:95a-1: shr'i ya m'a ri rakta manda lo pa yi k'a /
T02D2024:95a-3: dpal gshin rje gshed dmar po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D2024:95a-4: ga / bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po
T02D2024:95a-6: shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid dpal gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gtso //
T02D2024:95a-7: de la btud de dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2024:95a-8: cho ga mdor bsdus dran phyir brjod //
T02D2024:95a-9: dang po tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang ldan zhing 'gro
T02D2024:95a-10: ba 'don pa'i bsam pa can gyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D2024:95a-11: bdag nyid grub pa'i phyir ram /
T02D2024:95a-12: gzhan gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab pa de rjes su gzung ba'i phyir //
T02D2024:95a-13: gal te dkyil 'khor bri bar 'dod na //
T02D2024:95a-14: de'i tshe rnal 'byor bzhi sngon du 'gro bas sngon du bsnyen pa byas te //
T02D2024:95a-15: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed dmar po'i sngags 'bum bzlas shing /
T02D2024:95a-16: gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i khri bzlas pa 'am //
T02D2024:95a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su gnang ba'i mtshan ma thob pa'am /
T02D2024:95a-18: rang gi sems dag pas brtan par byas pas bri bar bya'o //
T02D2024:95a-19: de la cho ga bzhin du bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang par dkyil 'khor gyi 'dus byas la /
T02D2024:95a-21: mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang grogs dang ldan pas /
T02D2024:95a-23: aom bhu kham zhes pa'i sngags kyis nam mkha'i rang bzhin du byas la /
T02D2024:95a-24: h'um lam h'um zhes bya ba 'dis nor 'dzin rdo rje'i rang bzhin can /
T02D2024:95a-25: aom me di n'i badzri bha ba badzra bandha h'um zhes pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2024:95a-26: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i sa gzhi der
T02D2024:95a-27: gshin rje gshed dmar po'i ngo bo phyag na rdo
T02D2024:95a-28: rje dang / dril bu 'gying bas bsnams pa la
T02D2024:95a-29: slob ma gti mug gshin rje gshed la sogs pa'i
T02D2024:95a-30: rnal 'byor dang ldan pa lag na rdo rje dang
T02D2024:95a-31: dril bu thogs pa bzhis gsol ba gdab par bya
T02D2024:95a-32: rje dang / ste / gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2024:95a-33: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02D2024:95a-34: ston pa sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid //
T02D2024:95a-35: sku yi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2024:95a-36: phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2024:95a-37: gshin rje gshed po shin tu 'jigs //
T02D2024:95a-38: thugs kyi rdo rje rab gsal bas //
T02D2024:95b-0: rin chen rdo rje @95b khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2024:95b-1: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2024:95b-3: dbyangs mchog kun gyi mchog gi mchog //
T02D2024:95b-4: gsung gi rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2024:95b-5: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2024:95b-6: gshin rje gshed po las kun byed //
T02D2024:95b-7: sku yi rdo rje rab gsal ba//
T02D2024:95b-8: phyag na ral gri khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2024:95b-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02D2024:95b-10: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02D2024:95b-11: sangs rgyas kun rab mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dbang phyug khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2024:95b-13: dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtso bo ni //
T02D2024:95b-14: sdig pa thams cad zad mdzad pa //
T02D2024:95b-15: mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod //
T02D2024:95b-16: de rnams kyis dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab par rig nas /
T02D2024:95b-17: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dag 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas gzir ba la bltas te /
T02D2024:95b-18: nyon mongs pa la slar khro bas h'um badzra au
T02D2024:95b-19: tishtha zhes pa'i sngags kyis rang gi 'khor lo bteg
T02D2024:95b-20: la / rnal 'byor pas yi ge mas mig g-yon pa zla ba dang /
T02D2024:95b-21: yi ge ta sa mig g-yas pa nyi mar byas
T02D2024:95b-22: pas phyogs thams cad du gsal bar byas nas 'jig
T02D2024:95b-23: rten gsum la gsal bar blta zhing //
T02D2024:95b-24: rkang ba'i 'og tu rdo rje 'bar ba bsgoms la
T02D2024:95b-25: rdo rje gsor ba dang dril bu dkrol bar brtson
T02D2024:95b-26: pas rol pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyi gar gyis 'khor
T02D2024:95b-27: lo'i sa gzhi bskor bar bya ste /
T02D2024:95b-28: hr'i:shtri: la sogs pa ngag tu sgrogs pas gdug pa'i lha la sogs pa mtha' dag dang /
T02D2024:95b-29: bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams bskrad par byas te /
T02D2024:95b-30: lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi //
T02D2024:95b-31: bgegs kyi tshogs rnams kun nyon cig / nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2024:95b-32: srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor ba po //
T02D2024:95b-33: rdo rje'i gzugs ni 'bar ba yi //
T02D2024:95b-34: lus gsum las skyes dags par byas //
T02D2024:95b-35: gal te kha cig bdag las 'da' //
T02D2024:95b-37: rdo rje'i gnas su 'khor lo dang //
T02D2024:95b-39: ral gri bcug la bklag / par bya'o //
T02D2024:95b-40: sa yongs su bzung ba'i mjug thogs su bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D2024:96a-2: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya /
T02D2024:96a-4: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarbba p'a pi phat /
T02D2024:96a-5: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dha ra y'a dzny'a pa ya ti //
T02D2024:96a-6: sa rbba bi ghnam k'a ya w'a ka rtsi tta /
T02D2024:96a-7: badzra k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D2024:96a-9: stod ral gri gshin rje gshed kyis bgegs rnams la
T02D2024:96a-10: phyogs mtshams thams cad du phur bus gdab par bya'o
T02D2024:96a-12: 'di ltar sa gzhi bgegs med par bltas la /
T02D2024:96a-13: 'bar ba'i 'od zer rnon pos mtshams la sogs pa bcing bar byas nas /
T02D2024:96a-14: der bam las byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2024:96a-16: phyag g-yas pa dam bca' ba khas len pa'i phyag rgya dang /
T02D2024:96a-17: g-yon pas bum pa 'dzin pa spyan drangs la /
T02D2024:96a-18: me tog dang dri bzangs la sogs pa sna tshogs
T02D2024:96a-19: la sogs pas mchod la lhag par gnas par bya
T02D2024:96a-20: ste / skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2024:96a-21: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02D2024:96a-22: sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la //
T02D2024:96a-23: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2024:96a-24: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2024:96a-25: ji ltar bdud kyi dpung bcom pa //
T02D2024:96a-26: de ltar bdag gis bdud kyi ste //
T02D2024:96a-27: bcom nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi //
T02D2024:96a-28: zhes byas pa lan gsum brjod de //
T02D2024:96a-29: yang dag par mchod la de nas de nyid du thim par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2024:96a-30: sa'i lha mo lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2024:96a-31: de nas yang der dris nye bar byugs pa la me tog gcal du bkram la /
T02D2024:96a-32: lha rnams kyi gnas su tsandan la sogs pas dkyil 'khor byas la /
T02D2024:96a-33: der snying ga'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis 'khor lo spyan drangs la /
T02D2024:96a-34: mtshams bcing pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2024:96a-35: mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02D2024:96a-36: bdud rtsi myang bar bya ba'o //
T02D2024:96a-37: de nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02D2024:96a-38: lag pa g-yas pas spos phor bteg la 'khor lo'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D2024:96a-39: sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
T02D2024:96a-40: bcom ldan gshin rje gshed rdo rje //
T02D2024:96a-41: rig pa'i rgyal mchog khyod la 'dud //
T02D2024:96a-42: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2024:96a-43: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2024:96a-44: mgon po thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2024:96b-1: de phyir bcom ldan bdag gus la //
T02D2024:96b-2: bka' drin gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02D2024:96b-3: sangs rgyas 'gro don bya don stsol //
T02D2024:96b-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang //
T02D2024:96b-5: gzhan yang gang dag gsang sngags la //
T02D2024:96b-6: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //
T02D2024:96b-7: 'byung po byang chub bstan gnas dang //
T02D2024:96b-8: sems can bstan la mngon dga' ba //
T02D2024:96b-9: gang du rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams //
T02D2024:96b-10: bdag la yang dag dgongs su gsol //
T02D2024:96b-11: rdo rje 'chang chen che ge bdag / gshin rje gshed dmar dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2024:96b-12: ji ltar nus pa'i nyer spyod kyis //
T02D2024:96b-13: 'gro ba spyang phyir bri bar bya //
T02D2024:96b-14: deng bdag slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D2024:96b-15: rjes su brtse ba nyer bzung nas //
T02D2024:96b-17: nye bar gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs //
T02D2024:96b-18: de ltar lan gsum byas nas 'khor lo de yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2024:96b-21: de nas rnal 'byor pa yi ge dza: las byung ba'i zla ba dang /
T02D2024:96b-22: nyi ma'i mig can gyis gti mug gshin rje gshed
T02D2024:96b-23: la sogs pa'i sa bon las byung ba de rnams
T02D2024:96b-24: kyi kha dog can nyi shu rtsa lngar phye ste
T02D2024:96b-25: / srid du dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur sboms su
T02D2024:96b-26: sgo'i nyi shu cha can gyi srad bu dri bzangs
T02D2024:96b-27: kyis byugs pa la ral gri gshin rje gshed skud
T02D2024:96b-28: pa 'dzin pa dang lhan cig /'bar ba'i lta stangs
T02D2024:96b-29: kyi lcags kyus spyan drangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2024:96b-30: / rnams / aom d'i pa ti dri shti: aam ku sha dza:zhes pa'i sngags kyis bcug nas /
T02D2024:96b-31: aom a'a pra ya tstsha mo ha k'a la ha ri sva tsa kra s'u tra na ya h'um /
T02D2024:96b-32: zhes pa la sogs pa zhe sdang gshin rje gshed kyi bar du gsol ba btab la /
T02D2024:96b-33: aom a'a:aa nyo nya aa nu ga ta /
T02D2024:96b-34: sarbba dha rma sba ra sba ra aa nu ga ta sarbba dha rm'a:/
T02D2024:96b-35: aa tyanta aa nu pra bi shta:/
T02D2024:96b-37: zhes pa brjod cing bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D2024:96b-38: srad bu 'dzin pa yi ge dza: gsum gyis skud pa 'dzin pa rang gi dzdza:/
T02D2024:96b-41: dzdza:/ dzdza:/ zhes pa brjod de g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis lte
T02D2024:96b-42: ba'i steng du thig skud bzung nas khar gzhug /
T02D2024:96b-43: nub tu 'dug la shar du kha bltas te shar
T02D2024:96b-44: du 'dug cing nub tu kha bltas pa dang /
T02D2024:97a-1: cig nam mkha'i thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2024:97a-3: aom a'a: badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02D2024:97a-4: sems can don la khyed rnams kyi //
T02D2024:97a-5: dus yin de phyir 'dir spyon cig / ces pa'i
T02D2024:97a-6: theg skud kyi sgras nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
T02D2024:97a-7: gshegs pa rnams bskul zhing shar nub kyi tshangs pa'i
T02D2024:97a-9: byang du 'dug pas lhor kha bltas pa dang /
T02D2024:97a-10: lhan cig lho byang gi changs thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2024:97a-11: mer 'dug ste gnod spyin du kha bltas pa dang /
T02D2024:97a-12: dbang ldan du gnas te yi dvags su kha bltas bas shar gyi rtsa ba'i thig go //
T02D2024:97a-13: rlung du 'dug la yi dgas su kha bltas pa dang /
T02D2024:97a-14: bden bral du gnas nas gnod spyin du kha bltas pas nub kyi rtsa ba'i theg go //
T02D2024:97a-15: rlung du 'dug la dbang por kha bltas pa dang /
T02D2024:97a-16: dbang ldan du gnas nas klur kha bltas pas byang gi rtsa ba'i theg go /
T02D2024:97a-17: mer 'dug la klur kha bltas pa dang /
T02D2024:97a-18: bden bral du gnas nas dbang por kha bltas pas lho'i rtsa ba'i thig go //
T02D2024:97a-19: cho ga 'di nyid kyis tshangs pa'i thig dag gi gzhogs gnyis su thig bdun bdun no //
T02D2024:97a-20: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du thig drug drug go //
T02D2024:97a-21: phyi nas rtab bas kyi rjes su mthun pa'i thig go //
T02D2024:97a-23: de nas thig skud nyis ltab tu byas la dbang
T02D2024:97a-24: ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams nas g-yas skor du 'khor
T02D2024:97a-25: lo'i rnam pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba'i thig gnyis gdab
T02D2024:97a-26: par byas te / phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mos pa bya zhing ngo //
T02D2024:97a-27: 'dir mtshan ma min pas mi 'grub ste /
T02D2024:97a-28: thig sku chad na bla ma nyams //
T02D2024:97a-29: lhag chad skyong gyis nad du 'gyur //
T02D2024:97a-31: grub zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2024:97a-32: rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D2024:97a-33: theg bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan //
T02D2024:97a-34: dra ba dra phyed dar dang ni //
T02D2024:97a-35: me tog phreng la sogs pas brgyan //
T02D2024:97a-36: grva yi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02D2024:97a-37: sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D2024:97a-38: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis sbras //
T02D2024:97a-39: zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2024:97a-40: nang du ni dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad kyis
T02D2024:97a-41: sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba gru bzhi po rdo
T02D2024:97b-1: / de nas sgo'i bar du rtse mo lnga lngar rjes su mthun pa'i cha dbye'o //
T02D2024:97b-2: yi ge h'i:khro bo'i lta bas /
T02D2024:97b-3: sgo ni dkyil 'khor brgyang cha ru //
T02D2024:97b-4: bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya //
T02D2024:97b-5: tshad ldan shin tu mdzes pa yis //
T02D2024:97b-6: stegs bu chen po dor nas ni //
T02D2024:97b-7: sgo khyud sgo ltar shes bya ste //
T02D2024:97b-8: de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o //
T02D2024:97b-9: rol mo la sogs glu gar gyi //
T02D2024:97b-10: rdo rje lha mo yang dag ldan //
T02D2024:97b-11: stegs bu sgo yi phyed yin te //
T02D2024:97b-12: 'gram dang logs kyang de bzhin du //
T02D2024:97b-13: dra ba dra phyed nyid zla dang /
T02D2024:97b-14: me tog phreng ba'i snam bu yang //
T02D2024:97b-15: rtsa ba'i thig gis yi phyir //
T02D2024:97b-16: rdul tshon sa ni de yi phyed //
T02D2024:97b-17: rin chen ka sogs snam bu yi //
T02D2024:97b-18: sa gzhi tshon gyis dang mnyam //
T02D2024:97b-19: rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur te //
T02D2024:97b-20: ba dan dril bu dag dang ldan //
T02D2024:97b-21: dril bu dang bcas rlung gis bskyod //
T02D2024:97b-22: ba dan phyi yi mtshams su'o //
T02D2024:97b-23: gzhan rnams 'khor lo'i rjes mthun par //
T02D2024:97b-24: ji ltar mdzes par rab tu brtag / khru gang nas ni brtsams nas ni //
T02D2024:97b-25: ji srid khru ni stong gi bar //
T02D2024:97b-26: de srid du ni thig gdab pa'o //
T02D2024:97b-27: de ltar rim pa 'dis thig btab nas /
T02D2024:97b-28: snga ma'i rim pa kho nas 'bar ba'i lta stengs kyis /
T02D2024:97b-29: rdul tshon rnams yang dag par gzi brjid bskyed la mngon par bsngags par byas te ;
T02D2024:97b-30: aom badzra tsa tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02D2024:97b-31: de nas rang bzhin nyid kyis dag pa'i gshin rje
T02D2024:97b-32: mthar byed dmar po'i rnal 'byor pa kun du rtog
T02D2024:97b-33: pa dang bcas pa thams cad spangs pas 'khor lo'i
T02D2024:97b-35: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2024:97b-36: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis dgye bar byas te //
T02D2024:97b-37: dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang /
T02D2024:97b-39: re kh'a sgo'i nyi shu char mnyam par sbom phral
T02D2024:97b-40: sogs skyon mtha' dag dang bral bar dgye bar bya'o
T02D2024:97b-41: // de la sbom por dgye na nad do //
T02D2024:97b-45: bar du nas tsam gyi re kh'a dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2024:97b-46: shar phyogs su ni dkar po che //
T02D2024:97b-47: lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan //
T02D2024:97b-48: nub kyi [?] char ni dmar po ste //
T02D2024:97b-49: byang ni ljang gu yin par bshad //
T02D2024:97b-51: dbus kyis gzhi yang dag bri //
T02D2024:98a-1: 'khor kun nas bris la lta thams cad kyi gnas su sna chogs padma'o //
T02D2024:98a-2: dbus su nyi ma la gnas pa'i rdo rje dbyug pa dkar po mi mgo ser pos mtshan pa'o //
T02D2024:98a-3: shar gyi ra'i rtsa ba'i zla ba la gnas pa'i 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D2024:98a-4: lho'i ra'i rtsa bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i rin po che ljang gu cha dgu pa'o //
T02D2024:98a-5: bub kyi ra'i rtsa bar nyi ma la gnas pa'i padma dmar po'o //
T02D2024:98a-6: byang gi ra'i rtsa par nyi ma la ral gri ljang gu'o //
T02D2024:98a-7: sna tshogs rdo rje'i ma mtshams su 'khor lo'o //
T02D2024:98a-8: bden bral gyi mtshams su rdo rje'o //
T02D2024:98a-11: shar sgor rdo rje'i tho bar nyi shu pa'o //
T02D2024:98a-12: lho sgor dbyug pa dkar po'i //
T02D2024:98a-15: dkyil 'khor gyi zur bzhi na thod pa bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2024:98a-16: logs bzhir bum pa brgyad rdul tshon dgye ba'o //
T02D2024:98a-17: de ltar rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bltas la rnal 'byor
T02D2024:98a-18: pas rang snang gi yan lag gi sbyor bas sangs
T02D2024:98a-19: rgyas rnams bdag nyid la bcug la /
T02D2024:98a-20: sems des nam mkha'i khams khyab par byas nas /
T02D2024:98a-22: gnas ji lta bar bzhag la spyan la sogs pa
T02D2024:98a-23: dang sku la sogs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang
T02D2024:98a-24: / dbang bskur par byas la ye shes kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te /
T02D2024:98a-25: mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas /
T02D2024:98a-26: khro bo rnams kyis dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang /

T02D2024:101b-21: la las thams cad pa bzlas pa dpung par bcings
T02D2024:101b-24: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams //
T02D2024:101b-26: au dumw'a ra'i me tog bzhin //
T02D2024:101b-28: gang gis sems can mnyam med don //
T02D2024:101b-29: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2024:101b-30: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba //
T02D2024:101b-31: de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon //
T02D2024:101b-32: bskal pa bye ba du ma ru //
T02D2024:101b-33: sngon chad sdig pa ci mchis pa //
T02D2024:101b-35: de dag thams cad zad 'gyur na //
T02D2024:101b-36: grags pa mtha' yas gsang sngags kyi //
T02D2024:101b-37: spyod tshul la gnas smos ci dgos //
T02D2024:101b-38: skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na ni //
T02D2024:101b-40: spyod mchog 'di la gang rnams kyi //
T02D2024:101b-41: blo gros shin tu dri med pa //
T02D2024:101b-42: de rnams kyi ni sdug bsngal kun //
T02D2024:101b-44: bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis //
T02D2024:101b-45: de ring rnyed pa mnyam med rnyed //
T02D2024:101b-46: gang gis byed rnams rgyal ba kun //
T02D2024:101b-47: bdag nyid chen po sras bcas kyi //
T02D2024:101b-48: bstan pa 'di la thams cad ni //
T02D2024:101b-49: yongs su bzung zhing skye 'gyur ba //
T02D2024:102a-0: @102a * // de yis khyed rnams theg chen la //
T02D2024:102a-1: legs par skye ba nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2024:102a-2: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02D2024:102a-3: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02D2024:102a-5: de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D2024:102a-7: ku sha'i steng du nyal du gzhug ste /
T02D2024:102a-8: rmi lam gang cung zad mthong ba snga dro nga la smros shig ces bya'o //
T02D2024:102a-9: gal te mi dge ba'i mtshan ma smra na /
T02D2024:102a-10: de'i tshe las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis gzhom mo //

T02D2024:102a-13: dbang / dam pa dag la stsal nas ni //
T02D2024:102a-14: mgon po 'khor lo lha dag gis //

T02D2024:102a-16: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dang //
T02D2024:102a-17: sdom pa gsang mchog rtag tu ni //

T02D2024:102a-19: slob dpon dag 'gyur gsung du gsol //

T02D2024:102a-21: bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba dus 'di nas bzung ste /
T02D2024:102a-22: ji srid snying po byang chub la mchis kyi bar du /
T02D2024:102a-23: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2024:102a-24: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i //
T02D2024:102a-25: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2024:102a-26: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02D2024:102a-27: tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum //
T02D2024:102a-28: dge ba yi ni chos sdud dang //
T02D2024:102a-29: sems can don byed tshul khrims ni //
T02D2024:102a-30: bdag gis so sor brtan por bzung //
T02D2024:102a-31: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2024:102a-32: dkon mchog gsum mchog bla na med //
T02D2024:102a-33: sdom pa sangs rgyas rnal 'byor byung //
T02D2024:102a-34: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2024:102a-35: rdo rje chen po'i rigs bsdus pa //
T02D2024:102a-36: rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang //
T02D2024:102a-37: de nyid kyis ni rab tu gzung //
T02D2024:102a-38: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2024:102a-39: rin chen chen po'i rigs mchog gi / dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02D2024:102a-40: nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu //
T02D2024:102a-41: spyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu spyin //
T02D2024:102a-42: padma chen po'i rigs dag pas //
T02D2024:102a-43: byang chub chen po 'byung ba la //
T02D2024:102b-0: phyi dang gsang ba'i theg pa @102b gsum //
T02D2024:102b-1: dam chos so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2024:102b-2: las chen rigs ni bsdus pa la //
T02D2024:102b-3: sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02D2024:102b-4: mchod pa'i las ni ci nus spyin //
T02D2024:102b-5: kun nas so sor gzung bar bgyi //
T02D2024:102b-6: sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir //
T02D2024:102b-7: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2024:102b-8: dam pa yang dag bskyed bgyis shing //
T02D2024:102b-9: sdom pa ma lus bzung bgyis nas /
T02D2024:102b-10: ma rgal ba rnams pa sgra ya bar bgyi //
T02D2024:102b-11: ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02D2024:102b-12: dbugs ma phyung ba da bugs dbyung bgyi //
T02D2024:102b-13: sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod //
T02D2024:102b-14: ces bya ba lan gsum brjod du gzhug bar bya'o //
T02D2024:102b-15: slob dpon gyis sdom pa spyin pa ste /
T02D2024:102b-16: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D2024:102b-17: de nas dang por slob dpon dang slob ma gzhug pa'i cho gas dkyil 'khor du zhugs te /
T02D2024:102b-18: dbang thams cad rdzogs par blangs la rjes su gnang ba thob nas /
T02D2024:102b-19: yol ba'i phyi rol du yon phul zhing dbang bskur la /
T02D2024:102b-20: skal ba dang ldan pa'i slob ma rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs su dmigs la /
T02D2024:102b-22: zhes pa'i sngags kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung zhing gdong g-yogs bcings la /

T02D2024:102b-24: dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa'i don du dri bar bya ste /
T02D2024:102b-25: kye dga' ba la dga' ba la khyed su yin /
T02D2024:102b-26: bde chen bdag gi skal bzangs la gas //
T02D2024:102b-29: aom sarbba yo ga tsitta autp'a da y'a mi /
T02D2024:102b-30: zhes pas rnal 'byor gyi sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2024:102b-31: de nas aom su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho siddhi badzra yath'a su kham /
T02D2024:102b-32: zhes bya ba 'dis me tog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje snying gar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2024:102b-33: de nas sngar bshad pa'i yi ge lngas yol ba'i
T02D2024:102b-34: nang du bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par byas
T02D2024:102b-35: te / deng khyed de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis /
T02D2024:102b-36: de bas na ngas khyod la rdo rje'i sems bskyed par byas te /
T02D2024:102b-37: ye shes gang gis khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur na /
T02D2024:102b-38: dngos grub gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T02D2024:103a-0: khyod kyis 'di dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba @103a * //
T02D2024:103a-1: rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya ste /
T02D2024:103a-2: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
T02D2024:103a-3: de nas spyi bor rdo rje bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod de /
T02D2024:103a-4: 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste //
T02D2024:103a-5: gal te khyod kyis 'ga' zhig la //
T02D2024:103a-7: de nas snying gar gzhag la /
T02D2024:103a-8: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang //
T02D2024:103a-9: khyod kyi snying la yang dag zhugs //
T02D2024:103a-10: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2024:103a-11: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2024:103a-12: zhes pa 'dis mna' byed du bcug ste /
T02D2024:103a-13: tsandan dang gur kum la sogs pa dang bsres pa'i chu la /
T02D2024:103a-14: aom badzra au da ka tha: zhes bya ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas te /
T02D2024:103a-15: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2024:103a-16: dam tshig nyams na sreg par byed //
T02D2024:103a-17: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ste //
T02D2024:103a-18: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig / ces brjod cing 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D2024:103a-19: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par byas te /
T02D2024:103a-20: deng nas brtsams te khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje pa yin gyis /
T02D2024:103a-21: ngas 'di gyis shig ces gang bsgo ba de khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02D2024:103a-22: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par yang mi bya ste /
T02D2024:103a-23: khyod ya da ba ma spangs par 'chi ba'i dus
T02D2024:103a-24: byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta
T02D2024:103a-25: re zhes so // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2024:103a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab du gsol la zhes brjod du bcug nas /
T02D2024:103a-27: de'i spyi bor yi ge bam las byung ba'i chu'i
T02D2024:103a-28: dkyil 'khor yongs su zlum po dkar po bum pas
T02D2024:103a-30: snying gar lam las byung ba'i dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D2024:103a-31: 'khor gru bzhi pa ser po zung du rdo rje
T02D2024:103a-32: rtse gsum pas mtshan pa de la h'um ngo //
T02D2024:103a-33: lte bar ram las byung ba'i me'i dkyil 'khor gru
T02D2024:103a-34: gsum pa dmar po rno zhing 'bar ba de la
T02D2024:103a-35: aa:'o // rkang pa'i 'og tu yam las byung ba'i
T02D2024:103a-36: rlung gi dkyil 'khor sngon po gzhu'i dbyibs can mtha'
T02D2024:103a-37: mar ba dang gyis mtshan pa /
T02D2024:103a-38: de la dzheem drag cing bzod par dka' ba /
T02D2024:103a-39: 'bar ba'i gzugs can rlung gis bskyod bzhin par bsam ste /
T02D2024:103a-40: ji srid me'i dkyil 'khor gzhan dang mnyam par phyin nas /
T02D2024:103a-41: de yang des bskyod pas shin tu drag cing 'bar
T02D2024:103b-0: bas dbang chen gyi dkyil @103b 'khor 'bar bar gyur
T02D2024:103b-1: te / de las chu'i dkyil 'khor las bdud rtsi'i
T02D2024:103b-2: tshogs 'bar bas tshim par gyur pa'i slob ma rlung
T02D2024:103b-4: rang nyid bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i khro bo gshin rje 'joms byed kyi sku mi bzad pa /
T02D2024:103b-5: phyag g-yas kyis rdo rje gsor zhing g-yon pas dril
T02D2024:103b-6: bu dkrol bar spos dbul zhing 'bebs pa'i sngags kyes
T02D2024:103b-7: dbab par bya'o // de la sngags ni 'di yin te /

T02D2024:103b-9: a'a be sha ya stam bha ya ra ra rar
T02D2024:103b-10: ts'a la ya ts'a la ya h'um ha: aa: dzheem
T02D2024:103b-11: h'um phat / ces bya ba 'dis myur du phebs so //
T02D2024:103b-12: de nas 'dod chags gshin rje gshed kyi gzugs su
T02D2024:103b-13: skad cig gis dmigs la de'i lce la aa: dmar
T02D2024:103b-14: po bsgoms te / tishtha badzra zhes brjod la /

T02D2024:103b-18: dge dang mi dge legs par 'dri //

T02D2024:103b-22: 'jig rten gsum du gtogs pa shes so //
T02D2024:103b-23: sku babs pas nam mkha' la 'phar ro //
T02D2024:103b-24: de'i tshe de'i mgo bo'i steng du lam las byung
T02D2024:103b-25: ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rdo rjes
T02D2024:103b-26: mtshan pas de mnan par bsgoms na mi 'gul bar
T02D2024:103b-28: de nas bzung ba'i me tog pra t'itstsha badzra ho: zhes pas 'khor lor dor ro //
T02D2024:103b-30: nye ba'i sa gzhi las lhung ba de'i rigs su de bstan par bya'o //

T02D2024:103b-33: gnas tha ma la ni tha ma'o //
T02D2024:103b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu lhung na dngos grub med de /
T02D2024:103b-35: gal te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du lhung na de'i tshe slar dor bar bya'o //
T02D2024:103b-36: lan gsum byas nas de nyid du gal te ma lhung na de'i tshe dbyung bar bya'o //

T02D2024:103b-39: de'i mgo la bcing bar byas te /
T02D2024:103b-40: pra ti grihna stvam aam mam satva ma h'a ba la /
T02D2024:103b-42: aom de ring rdo rje sems dpa' rang /

T02D2024:104a-2: thams cad mig ni 'byed par mdzad //
T02D2024:104a-3: ces brjod cing gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //
T02D2024:104a-4: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi so so'i
T02D2024:104a-5: mtshan brjod pa sngon du 'gro bas shar gyi sgo
T02D2024:104a-6: skyong nas brtsams nas gtso bo'i bar du bstan par
T02D2024:104a-7: bya'o // zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor du gzhung pa'o //
T02D2024:104a-9: sangs rgyas shes rab chen po yis //
T02D2024:104a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar //
T02D2024:104a-11: bdag kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing //
T02D2024:104a-12: mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol //
T02D2024:104a-13: zhes bya bas gsol ba btab pa dang ldan pa'i
T02D2024:104a-14: slob ma la rdo rje tsa rtsi ka la sogs
T02D2024:104a-15: pa'i bum pa bzung bas dbang bskur bar bsgom zhing
T02D2024:104a-16: / dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02D2024:104a-17: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D2024:104a-18: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad kyi //
T02D2024:104a-19: gsang gsum gnas byung spyin par bya //
T02D2024:104a-20: zhes brjod de las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i bum
T02D2024:104a-21: pa nas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i khu tshur gyis
T02D2024:104a-22: chu blangs la / aom badzra aa bjo shinyts'a mi /
T02D2024:104a-23: zhes brjod cing 'khor los sgyur ba bzhin du bkra
T02D2024:104a-24: shis kyi glu sngon du 'gro bas dbang bskur bar

T02D2024:104a-29: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag po'i gzugs
T02D2024:104a-30: kyi cod pan la bzhugs par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2024:104a-31: 'di ni cod pan gyi dbang ngo //
T02D2024:104a-32: de'i rjes la rdo rje gzung ste /
T02D2024:104a-33: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi //
T02D2024:104a-34: dbang gis de ring khyod dbang bskur //

T02D2024:104a-36: rdo rje rab tu grub phyir zung //
T02D2024:104a-37: zhes brjod de rdo rjes snying ga la sogs par
T02D2024:104a-38: reg la rdo rje lag pa g-yas su spyin par
T02D2024:104a-39: bya'o // 'di ni rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02D2024:104a-40: de nas slob ma'i lag pa g-yon du dril bu byin la /
T02D2024:104a-41: rdo rje dril bu gnyis dang ldan pa'i lag pa dag 'khyud pa'i tshul byed du bcug la /
T02D2024:104a-42: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa
T02D2024:104a-43: mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la
T02D2024:104a-44: spyin par bya'o // dril bu'i dbang bskur ba nyid
T02D2024:104b-0: la bdag po'i dbang bskur ba zhes @104b byas so
T02D2024:104b-1: spyin par bya'o // // de nas rdo rje dang dril bu mgo bor bzung la /
T02D2024:104b-2: aom badzra satva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma /
T02D2024:104b-3: aa bhi she ka te sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2024:104b-4: kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes pa la
T02D2024:104b-5: sogs pa rigs dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming gdags
T02D2024:104b-6: so // dbang bskur 'di dag bya ba dang //
T02D2024:104b-7: spyod pa'i rgyud bshad pa dang /
T02D2024:104b-8: sngags sgrub pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2024:104b-9: dbang lnga po 'di nyid cod pan gyi dbang ste /

T02D2024:104b-11: cod pan la dbang gi tshul du bya ba'i phyir
T02D2024:104b-12: ro // de nas cod pan gyi dbang la sogs
T02D2024:104b-13: pa bzung zhing slob dpon gyi sdom pa gzung ba'i
T02D2024:104b-14: ro // slob mas / gang gis bdag ni khyod drin las //
T02D2024:104b-15: rang dang gzhan don nus 'gyur ba //
T02D2024:104b-16: rdo rje slob dpon gyi ni dbang //
T02D2024:104b-17: snying brtse'i gter gyi bdag la stsol //
T02D2024:104b-18: zhes pas gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D2024:104b-19: ldan pa'i slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi drung du /
T02D2024:104b-20: rdul tshon dkar po'i padma 'dab brgyad byas pa'i steng
T02D2024:104b-21: du shing stan la bzhag pa rdo rje tsartsi ka
T02D2024:104b-22: la sogs pa rnams kyis snga ma bzhin du dbang
T02D2024:104b-23: bskur te / dam tshig gsum 'dzin du bcug nas so //
T02D2024:104b-24: de la dam tshig gsum ni 'di yin te /
T02D2024:104b-25: rdo rje yi ge h'um las rdo rjer bsgoms la /

T02D2024:104b-27: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas la //

T02D2024:104b-29: bdud las rgyal bar bya phyir zung //
T02D2024:104b-30: zhes pas de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje du gzhug go zhes pas /

T02D2024:104b-40: dam pa'i srid pa byed par 'gyur //

T02D2024:109b-27: dngos grub dam tshig sdom pa 'di //
T02D2024:109b-28: khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bya ste //
T02D2024:109b-29: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02D2024:109b-30: mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' yin no //

T02D2024:109b-51: rtag par rgyun du gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2024:110a-0: @110a * // rtag tu dam tshig la sogs bsten //
T02D2024:110a-1: gal te bla ma smod de bzhin //
T02D2024:110a-2: dam tshig bag med gyur pa na //
T02D2024:110a-3: de tshe dkyil 'khor de bris la //
T02D2024:110a-4: bde gshegs rnams la sdig pa bshags //
T02D2024:110a-5: deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2024:110a-6: gang phyir 'di ni legs par gnas //
T02D2024:110a-7: dam tshig lha rnams dang mnyam par //
T02D2024:110a-8: gnas bar 'gyur ba the tshom med //
T02D2024:110a-9: sangs rgyas rdo rje can bcas pa //

T02D2024:110a-11: khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che //
T02D2024:110a-12: rgyal srid bdag po bstan pa yin //
T02D2024:110a-13: de ring bdud las rnam par rgyal //
T02D2024:110a-14: grong khyer mchog tu rab bzhugs so //
T02D2024:110a-15: de ring khyod kyis sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2024:110a-16: thob pa 'di la the tshom med //
T02D2024:110a-17: 'di ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis //
T02D2024:110a-18: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde ster bstan par gyis //
T02D2024:110a-19: de ring 'gro ba de myur rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D2024:110a-20: mtshungs pa'i rtag pa nyid du khyod rnams phyin par 'gyur //
T02D2024:110a-21: slob ma rab gus mnyes shin pas //

T02D2024:110a-24: gsung ni de ltar bdag gis bgyi //
T02D2024:110a-25: gal te 'byor na de rnams kyi mthe bong g-yas
T02D2024:110a-26: pa lag pa g-yon pas bzung la spyin sreg gis
T02D2024:110a-30: bdun phul nas yon blang bar bya'o //
T02D2024:110a-31: de rnams kyis kyang dga' ba'i yid kyis ji ltar 'byor pa'i sa gzhi glang po dang /
T02D2024:110a-37: bran mo la sogs pa dbul zhing /
T02D2024:110a-39: thos pa la sogs pa yon tan bsam pa grub pa'i phyir dbul lo //
T02D2024:110a-40: de nas slob ma rnams mnyes par byas te /

T02D2024:110a-42: spyod yul thams cad kyis 'khor lo mchod par bya'o
T02D2024:110a-43: // 'os pa'i slob ma rnams bzung ste /

T02D2024:110a-46: bstod pa dang bdud rtsi myang bar byas la gsol ba btab nas gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2024:110a-47: lha'i nga rgyal brtan pas chos thams cad ni dngos
T02D2024:110b-0: po med pa'o @110b zhes brjod cing rdo rje'i rtse

T02D2024:110b-2: la sogs pa dbyi bar bya'o //

T02D2024:110b-5: khung bu 'gengs dang rab gnas dang //
